title: [Massive] Online Team-Based Scientific Inquiry Project Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in scientific fields (hypothesis formulation, experimental design, data analysis, etc.) and online learning experience
context.additional_context: A non-degree course for current professionals, focusing on strengthening team collaboration skills to solve real scientific problems within organizations. Comprises asynchronous learning via LMS and project-based assessments, with systematic project management emphasized according to the scientific inquiry process (observation→hypothesis→experiment→analysis→conclusion).

learning_goals: Learners can effectively communicate with team members about scientific hypotheses and experimental designs using online collaboration tools.
Learners can systematically plan and execute team projects to solve practical problems in science, including controlling variables and analyzing data.
Learners can submit and receive feedback on weekly project deliverables (e.g., lab reports, data visualizations) using collaborative features within the LMS.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
